meanings.definition: Guilty of lying or giving false testimony under oath.
meanings.sent1: The perjurious witness was caught in a web of lies during the trial.
meanings.sent2: The court found the perjurious defendant guilty of perjury.
meanings.sent3: The perjurious statement made by the witness was so obvious, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: Her perjurious behavior painted a false picture of innocence.
meanings.sent5: The perjurious testimony shattered the trust in the legal system.
